lines:
1996

to

Riva

79 Montgomery Street 
Boston / Mail

Jau, 9, 1910. 
Dear The Steams;

Pishall, he hack to luda 
beman. Ylease send me 8/0. 
as lom as you eau. Very much 
obliged

very

yum

Polar

Please find euelmed bil 
aud me a fa

SIC
raw: 1996 to Riva 79 Montgomery Street Boston / Mail Jau, 9, 1910. Dear The Steams; Pishall, he hack to luda beman. Ylease send me 8/0. as lom as you eau. Very much obliged very yum Polar Please find euelmed bil aud me a fa SIC

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter requesting $10 and another $5 for a bill. He says he will be back to Andover soon.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
